commit.message:
Rollup merge of #67127 - estebank:disambiguate-suggestion, r=varkor

Use structured suggestion for disambiguating method calls

Fix #65635.

committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1576840640 +0100

Rollup merge of #67127 - estebank:disambiguate-suggestion, r=varkor

Use structured suggestion for disambiguating method calls

Fix #65635.
